item.title: Space Ablaze: 2D Survival Shooter Game written in C++ using RayLib Library
item.description: Your browser does not support the video tag. Experience the blast from the past and dive into the world of retro with SPACE ABLAZE, where you will experience the thrill of a classic arcade. Space Ablaze is a survival and top-down shooter that uses simple joystick-like controls. The game is set in the vastness of space, where you’ll face a relentless swarm of enemy battleships that grow more formidable with each passing moment.
